entry.title: Home updated
entry.content:
Translation Policy

I'm thrilled that people are interested in publishing translations of my work into other languages. You're more than welcome to, but I ask two things in return:

  1. You include a link back to the original article.

  2. You give me the rights to post a copy of the translation (with a link to the version on your site).

Send me an email with a link to the translation -- or the translation itself if you want me to post it.

Thanks so much!
